section.name: Component Directives
section.p: A component directive defines a component deployment solution. Technically speaking a directive is expressed as part strategy defintion encapsulating solution data for the construction of a component context model and a component internal structure. The XML defintion is used to establish internal datatypes, which in turn are used to establish the initial state of a component model.
